list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: move or jump suddenly or rapidly upward or forward.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: madness and creativity could spring from the same source
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: sự điên rồ và sáng tạo có thể mùa xuân từ cùng một nguồn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (especially of wood) become warped or split.
the season after winter and before summer, in which vegetation begins to appear, in the northern hemisphere from March to May and in the southern hemisphere from September to November.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: in spring the garden is a feast of blossom
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Vào mùa xuân, khu vườn là một bữa tiệc của Blossom

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a resilient device, typically a helical metal coil, that can be pressed or pulled but returns to its former shape when released, used chiefly to exert constant tension or absorb movement.
a sudden jump upward or forward.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: with a sudden spring, he leapt onto the table
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: với một mùa xuân bất ngờ, anh ấy nhảy lên bàn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a place where water or oil wells up from an underground source, or the basin or flow formed in such a way.
an upward curvature of a ship's deck planking from the horizontal.
